mapper.select: select groupid id , isparent, t.name name from ( select a.groupid, a.groupname name, case when (select count(*) from sys_group s where s.parentid=a.groupid)>0 then 'true' else 'false' end isparent, (select count(*) from aaa1 l where l.aaa148=a.groupid) groupcou , (select count(*) from sys_usergroupref x,sys_user y where x.userid=y.userid and x.groupid in (select aab301 from aaa1 l where l.aaa148=a.groupid)) usercou from sys_group a where a.parentid=#{parentid} order by a.groupid ) t
select groupid,groupname,description from sys_group t where t.groupid=#{groupid}

select b.userid, b.username, b.cnname, case when (select count(*) from sys_user_role t where t.userid=b.userid)>0 then 'true' else 'false' end isgrant from sys_group a,sys_user b,sys_usergroupref c where a.groupid=c.groupid and b.userid=c.userid and a.groupid=#{groupid}
select roleid, rolename, rolecode, roledescribe, case when (select count(*) from sys_user_role s where s.roleid=t.roleid and s.userid=#{userid})>0 then 'true' else 'false' end checked from sys_role t
select username,cnname from sys_user t where t.username=#{username}
select groupid,groupname from sys_group t where t.name=#{name}
select groupid,groupname from sys_group t where t.parentid=#{groupid}
mapper.delete: delete t.* from sys_user_role t where t.userid=#{userid}
delete t.* from sys_group t where t.groupid=#{groupid}

select REPLACE(uuid(), '-', '')
insert into sys_user_role(id,userid,roleid) values (#{id},#{userid},#{roleid})
